thread.title: Counting Future Cost of Parental Leave Now

author: wsjcom
title: Counting Future Cost of Parental Leave Now
text:
“A Simple Plan for Parental Leave” by Kristin A. Shapiro and Andrew G. Biggs (op-ed, Jan. 25) is a great proposal. Payments to support child rearing at Social Security disability levels offset by a delay in retirement benefits later in life is a great trade, particularly if consideration of such a program could open the door to more comprehensive Social Security reform.
